sentence.Network_en: They were coming in to land on the north coast of Crete.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将从克里特岛北海岸登陆上岛。

sentence.Network_en: Soon after 2000 BC, the people of Crete began building towns.
sentence.Network_cn: 公元前2000年后不久, 克里特人开始修筑城市.

sentence.Network_en: He's an archaeologist and has been on a dig in Crete for the past year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是位考古学家，过去的一年都在参与克里特岛上的一项考古发掘工作。
